review: This set should be a staple in everyone's kitchen.These turn boring peanut butter and banana sandwich making into real live Fruit Ninja trainingI just wish this 2 pack would include both a left curve and a right curve slicer. As it stands I can slice and dice dozens of right curved bananas in seconds like a ninja master working with both hands.But the left curve bananas in each bunch just end up getting thrown out as I don't have the time to deal with normal knives.
